thread.title: Deadpool officially joins the Avengers, authorised by Steve Rogers - Comics
thread.title_full: Deadpool officially joins the Avengers, authorised by Steve Rogers - Comics News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Deadpool officially joins the Avengers, authorised by Steve Rogers - Comics
text: That's right, fan favourite fourth wall-breaking superhero Deadpool has officially joined the Avengers.A short story in Marvel's Avengers #0, from Gerry Duggan, Ryan Stegman and Richard Isanove, sees Wade Wilson completing an assignment from Steve Rogers. © Marvel Comics When Deadpool returns, he's given his own official ID card by the former Captain America. It's also revealed that the Terrigen Mists of the Inhumans are making Rogue and other mutants ill.Deadpool will be part of the Uncanny Avengers team, which is made up of members from both the Avengers and X-Men. © Marvel Comics Avengers #0, which launched last Wednesday (October 7), also sets up titles including New Avengers and The Ultimates.Ryan Reynolds plays Deadpool on the big screen, and the wise-cracking character will be getting his own movie in 2016.
